page.title: 11Transport
page.content: In our area we have a railway station called Littlehaven, 3 regular bus services, one garage which sells and services cars and a new Northern Bypass is being built. The train services on the main Victoria Line to the North mainly stop at Gatwick, Crawley, East Croydon, Clapham Junction and Victoria. British Rail are changing the barriers at Littlehaven Station and are also going to change the level of the crossing. The main stations to the South of Littlehaven are Horsham, Bognor Regis and Portsmouth. There is one garage which sells and services all cars called "County Croft Cars". There are 2 bus companies that run buses regularly through our block. They are Southdown and the privately owned Tillingbourne.
